mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dfs_result_table ( source_class_name, source_method_name, source_method_desc, sink_class_name, sink_method_name, sink_method_desc, dfs_depth, dfs_mode, dfs_list_uid ) VALUES ( #{result.sourceClassName}, #{result.sourceMethodName}, #{result.sourceMethodDesc}, #{result.sinkClassName}, #{result.sinkMethodName}, #{result.sinkMethodDesc}, #{result.dfsDepth}, #{result.dfsMode}, #{result.dfsListUid} )
